snippet: The Congressional action is the latest effort to remove language from federal law that has become outdated or is considered demeaning.
abstract: Word 'lunatic' will be stricken from federal law under legislation that passed the House and is headed to Pres Obama for his signature; Congressional action is the latest effort to remove language from federal law that has become outdated or is considered demeaning.
lead_paragraph: The Congressional action is the latest effort to remove language from federal law that has become outdated or is considered demeaning.

headline.seo: House Votes to Eliminate ‘Lunatic’ From Laws
headline.main: House Approves Eliminating ‘Lunatic’ From Federal Law
headline.print_headline: House Approves Eliminating ‘Lunatic’ From Federal Law
